abstract: University of Mississippi defensive tackle Robert Nkemdiche is hospitalized after falling from wall at hotel in Atlanta; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Robert Nkemdiche, a junior defensive tackle at Mississippi, was hospitalized after falling from a wall at an Atlanta hotel, the police said Sunday.

headline.main: Mississippi Player Injured in Fall at Hotel
headline.print_headline: Mississippi Player Injured in Fall at Hotel

snippet: Robert Nkemdiche, a junior defensive tackle at Mississippi, was hospitalized after falling from a wall at an Atlanta hotel, the police said Sunday.
